title: Episode 50: Beer Advocate
description: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy speaks to Todd AlstrÃ¶m of Beer Advocate and Shane Welsh of Sixpoint Brewery. Learn how Beer Advocate has become the premiere source of beer reviews and a catalyst for festivals in Boston–from their humble beginnings during the nascent stages of the Interwebs (1996!) to their new print monthly magazine. Tune in for talk about “extreme” beer, traditional beer, and everything in between. This episode was sponsored by Cabot Cheese of Vermont, Dairy Farm Family owned since 1919
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
